title: Want to Buy: ALL SET - THANK YOU!
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: Want to Buy: ALL SET - THANK YOU!
posts.post_content:
Want to Buy: T206 Kelley or Gibson With Sovereign, Tolstoi, or Old Mill Back

Looking for low to mid-grade examples with clean / presentable fronts for a friend who's doing a back run.

Please email scan(s) and price(s) of any you might have for sale to [url]trae@t206.org[/url] - thanks!

Hi Trae,

I have an extra Luther "Dummy" Taylor Piedmont 350 back that I just bought an upgrade for.  It's a SGC 30 and I paid $50 for it.  Let me know if you are interested.  Presents well.  I don't have a scan, but I'd send it for your approval.

Thanks,
Scott.
Scott, I appreciate it, but I'm confused. Please see my post title: "Want to Buy: T206 Kelley"
I would let this go for $225.00 or would trade for a red Chance portrait of equal grade. Thanks Daryl

Daryl--I'll take the Kelley Sovereign--my email is [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]
bill latzko

Nice try, Bill. :)

Thanks for the card, Daryl!
